ctx: apply ex_series_ext with (fun n => Rabs (a n * x ^ n)).
exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R x : R H : Rbar_lt (Rabs x) (CV_radius a) Unable to unify "(ex_pseries ?M2373 ?M2374 -> ex_series (fun n : nat => ?M2373 n * ?M2374 ^ n)) /\\ (ex_series (fun n : nat => ?M2373 n * ?M2374 ^ n) -> ex_pseries ?M2373 ?M2374)" with "exists l : R_NormedModule, is_series (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n * x ^ n)) l".

ctx: apply ex_series_ext with (fun n => Rabs (a n * x ^ n)).
exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R x, r : R Heqr : CV_radius a = r H : Rabs x < r H0 : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_series (fun n : nat => a n * x ^ n) -> ex_pseries a x H1 : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> ex_series (fun n : nat => a n * x ^ n) Unable to unify "Rabs x < r" with "ex_series (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n * x ^ n))".

original: intros a x H. apply ex_series_Rabs. apply ex_series_ext with (fun n => Rabs (a n * x ^ n)). - intros n. rewrite Rabs_Rabsolu. reflexivity. - apply ex_pseries_R. apply H.
